original_text: With the work of an engraver in stone, like the engravings of a signet, shalt thou engrave the two stones with the names of the children of Israel: thou shalt make them to be set in ouches of gold.
korean_text: 보석을 새기는 자가 도장에 새김 같이 너는 이스라엘 아들들의 이름을 그 두 보석에 새겨 금 테에 물리고

sentences.original_text: With the work of an engraver in stone
like the engravings of a signet
shalt thou engrave the two stones
with the names of the children of Israel
thou shalt make them to be set
